5.16. get Filter

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !block get[; parameters]
  ...
  !endblock

The parameters are:

Name Type Rule
report string  
rule string  
filename string  
inverse boolean  

See Understanding Filter Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

The get filter is used to extract embedded documentation. The parameters map to the options for sdfget.
